Disabled & chronically ill writer. Former theatre critic. Passionate about disability rights, clean air, masks and covid caution. Clean air is a human right & masks work.

I write about the experience of being highly vulnerable during a pandemic, isolation, loss of healthcare and euthanasia. My focus is on how we can find support, fight back & create better systems and safety nets everyone.

I'm a journalist and academic specializing in the future of local news. My next book, co-authored with Ellen Clegg, will be called "What Works in Community News: Media Startups, News Deserts, and the Future of the Fourth Estate."
